import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {ProductsService} from '../../services/products.service' @Component({ selector: 'app-product-page', templateUrl: './product-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-page.component.scss'] }) export class ProductPageComponent implements OnInit { title = 'angular app' // products: IProduct[] = [] loading = false // products$: Observable term = '' constructor( public productsService: ProductsService, ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.loading = true // this.products$ = this.productsService.getAll().pipe( // tap(() => this.loading = false) // ) this.productsService.getAll().subscribe(() => { console.log('productsService',this.productsService.products); this.loading = false }) } }
